mapper.update:
update pg_email_log
email_info = #{emailInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
entity_id = #{entityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
room_nbr = #{roomNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update pg_email_log set email_info = #{emailInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entity_id = #{entityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, room_nbr = #{roomNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gname = #{gname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT * from pg_email_log pe where pe.entity_id =#{entityId}
and pe.gname like '%${gname}%'
and pe.email like '%${email}%'
ORDER BY pe.id DESC
